name: Iyyara & Halalfoodhunt
shortDes: Iyyara & Halalfoodhunt is an app from Singapore that verifies halal food options (eateries, online businesses, food vendors, etc.) before publishing them.
descriptions: Developed RESTful APIs for a new module using Express.js and Prisma, ensuring data integrity with thorough testing.
Implemented Stripe payments and business logic to create custom subscription plans.
Configured CI/CD pipeline to deploy the product to staging and production environments using GitLab CI/CD, and Docker.
Created a scheduled database backup strategy with Shell Script for self-deployed MongoDB.
keyTechs: Express.js, Meteor.js, Prisma, MongoDB, Docker, GitLab CI/CD, Shell Script, AWS S3

name: Tico E-commerce
shortDes: Tico E-commerce is an in-house product, a set of commerce tools and modules that can be used to build unique commerce experiences.
descriptions: Conducted in-depth analysis and research on popular Open-source platforms to plan and break down features.
Leveraged my expertise in Python, FastAPI and PostgreSQL to build a scalable and high-performance e-commerce module that seamlessly integrates with existing systems.
Guided newly joined engineers, facilitating their integration into the project quickly.
Configured Nginx as a scalable API Gateway and Load Balancer, following best practices to ensure security, and optimal performance.
Established a seamless integration for diverse payment gateways (VNPay, Momo, Stripe) and shipping providers (GHTK, GHN) within the system.
keyTechs: FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Redis, SQLAlchemy, APScheduler, Pytest, GitLab CI/CD, Docker, Nginx, AWS EC2

name: Early Parrot
shortDes: EarlyParrot is a SaaS referral marketing platform from Malta that includes marketing automation tools, tracking and analytics features.
descriptions: Leveraged Angular.js and Bootstrap to craft an intuitive user interface, ensuring a seamless user experience.
Developed complex features with Express.js to track marketing campaign metrics, empowering users to analyze campaign effectiveness.
Built robust data synchronization mechanisms with Agenda.js to guarantee user data integrity across diverse SaaS ecosystems.
Addressed race condition occurrences within legacy features and during concurrent data synchronization.
keyTechs: Express.js, MongoDB, Redis, Angular.js, Async.js, Agenda.js, Mongoose, Bootstrap, Linux, PM2

name: Mark Platform
shortDes: Mark Platform is a platform that connects homeowners with top-rated interior designers in Singapore.
descriptions: Developed middleware to dynamically authenticate user roles based on API endpoints.
Employed FastAPI to expedite RESTful API development and bolstered code quality through automated testing with Pytest.
Incorporated Stripe Payments API to establish a robust subscription system.
Implemented a CI/CD pipeline on GitLab CI/CD for automated deployments utilizing Docker and Nginx on a DigitalOcean Droplet.
keyTechs: FastAPI, PostgreSQL, SQLAlchemy, APScheduler, FastAPI Users, Pytest, Firebase, Docker, Nginx, GitLab CI/CD, Shell Script
